thread.section_title: TShirt Studio Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of tshirtstudio.com
thread.title: Kogia simas
thread.title_full: TShirt Studio reviewed by Kogia simas

author: Kogia simas
title: Kogia simas
text:
Would definitely recommend to use based on that alone.
An item I ordered turned out to be a different size from others in the same size-range (Fruit of the Loom medium is much smaller than other mediums). I emailed TShirt Studio, they responded within an hour or so and arranged (without any issue) to send out an alternative size. It arrived the next day.
All companies should work like this, I will be glad to carry on buying from here with this level of customer service.
Thank you.
